quote: I started my life with a single absolute: that the world was mine to shape in the image of my highest values and never to be given up to a lesser standard, no matter how long or hard the struggle.
quote_letters: I STARTED MY LIFE WITH A SINGLE ABSOLUTE THAT THE WORLD WAS MINE TO SHAPE IN THE IMAGE OF MY HIGHEST VALUES AND NEVER TO BE GIVEN UP TO A LESSER STANDARD NO MATTER HOW LONG OR HARD THE STRUGGLE
chat:
abolished - Ended completely or nullified
Clue: Cancelled thoroughly beyond doubt

yamaha - A Japanese manufacturer of motorcycles and other motor vehicles
Clue: Japanese wheels manufacturer

nowhere - Not in or to any place
Clue: Not anywhere

register - To enter or record information in an official list or bank
Clue: Officially record or list

attributes - A quality or feature regarded as a characteristic or inherent part of someone or something
Clue: Distinguishing qualities

nightmare - A frightening or unpleasant dream
Clue: Terrifying dream

davenport - A large sofa or couch, typically upholstered in a low-priced fabric
Clue: Inexpensive sofa or couch

amendment - A minor change or addition designed to improve a text, piece of legislation, etc.
Clue: Minor revision

thought - The product of mental activity; that which one thinks
Clue: Ideas or notions

legally - In a way that is connected with the law
Clue: Lawfully

asphalt - A black sticky substance used for making roads and roofs
Clue: Road surface material

savings - A typically bank account intended for keeping and accumulating money
Clue: Accumulated funds saved up

somewhat - To a moderate extent; a little
Clue: Moderately, slightly

hollow - Having a empty space inside; not solid
Clue: Empty inside, not solid

revolt - A violent uprising against an authority or government
Clue: Rebellion against authority

unionist - Supporter or member of a labor union
Clue: Labor union member

gifted - Having exceptional talent or natural ability
Clue: Extremely talented

greenhouse - A building with glass walls and roof, for growing plants needing warmth and protection
Clue: Glass building for plant cultivation

east-west - Referring to the direction from east to west
Clue: Oriented horizontally from east to west

drifted - Been carried slowly by a current of air or water
Clue: Slowly moved by air or water currents.
